displayName.english: The Shape of Things to Come

description.english: Defeat Joseph in Graham Manor
description.french: Battez Joseph dans le manoir Graham
description.italian: Sconfiggi Joseph nel Maniero Graham
description.spanish: Derrota a Joseph en la Mansión Graham.

description.english: Start your journey in Graham Manor
description.french: Vous commencez votre aventure au manoir Graham
description.german: Beginne deine Reise im Graham Anwesen
description.italian: L'ombra di ciò che accadrà
description.spanish: Inicia tu recorrido por la Mansión Graham.

description.english: Defeat Owen in the House of Always
description.french: Battez Owen dans la maison de l’Éternité
description.german: Besiege Owen im Haus der Ewigkeit
description.italian: Sconfiggi Owen nella Casa dell'eternità
description.spanish: Derrota a Owen en la Casa de la Eternidad.

displayName.english: I’ll be safe in the basement...
displayName.french: Rien ne peut m’arriver au sous-sol…

description.english: Survive the farmhouse assault
description.french: Survivez à l’attaque de la ferme
description.german: Überlebe den Angriff auf das Bauernhaus
description.italian: Sopravvivi all'assalto della fattoria
description.spanish: Sobrevive al ataque en la casa de la granja.

displayName.french: Il fallait pas se faire un sang d’encre

description.english: Defeat Owen in the farmhouse basement
description.french: Battez Owen au sous-sol de la ferme
description.german: Besiege Owen im Keller des Bauernhauses
description.italian: Sconfiggi Owen nel seminterrato della fattoria
description.spanish: Derrota a Owen en el sótano de la casa de la granja.

description.english: Defeat Harry in Graham Memorial
description.french: Battez Harry au Graham Memorial
description.italian: Sconfiggi Harry nel Graham Memorial
description.spanish: Derrota a Harry en Graham Memorial.

description.english: Defeat Joseph in the cistern
description.french: Battez Joseph à la citerne
description.italian: Sconfiggi Joseph nella cisterna
description.spanish: Derrota a Joseph en la cisterna.

description.english: Re-Visit Graham Manor
description.french: Retournez au manoir Graham
description.italian: Visita di nuovo il Maniero Graham
description.spanish: Regresa a la Mansión Graham.

description.english: Survive the attack in Graham Manor attic
description.french: Survivez à l’attaque dans le grenier du manoir Graham
description.german: Überlebe den Angriff auf dem Dachboden des Graham Anwesens
description.italian: Sopravvivi all'attacco nella soffitta del Maniero Graham
description.spanish: Sobrevive al ataque en el ático de la Mansión Graham.

description.english: Defeat Adam in Graham Memorial
description.french: Battez Adam au Graham Memorial
description.italian: Sconfiggi Adam nel Graham Memorial
description.spanish: Derrota a Adam en Graham Memorial.

description.english: Complete St. Albion
description.french: Terminez St. Albion
description.italian: Completa St. Albion
description.spanish: Completa St. Albion.

description.english: Override the security system in the beach house
description.french: Désactivez le système de sécurité de la maison de plage
description.italian: Disabilita il sistema di sicurezza nella casa sulla spiaggia
description.spanish: Desactiva el sistema de seguridad de la casa de la playa.

description.english: Defeat Harry in the mines
description.french: Battez Harry dans les mines
description.italian: Sconfiggi Harry nelle miniere
description.spanish: Derrota a Harry en las minas.

description.english: Enter the Wellspring
description.french: Atteignez la source de vie
description.italian: Entra nella Fonte di vita
description.spanish: Entra en la Fuente de la Vida.

description.english: Defeat Adam in the Wellspring
description.french: Battez Adam à la source de vie
description.german: Besiege Adam in der Quelle des Lebens
description.italian: Sconfiggi Adam nella Fonte di vita
description.spanish: Derrota a Adam en la Fuente de la Vida.

description.english: Enter the temple
description.french: Entrez dans le temple
description.italian: Entra nel tempio
description.spanish: Entra en el templo.

displayName.french: La chute de la maison Graham

description.english: Defeat William
description.french: Battez William
description.italian: Sconfiggi William
description.spanish: Derrota a William.

description.english: Escape Velvet Island
description.french: Échappez-vous de Velvet Island
description.italian: Fuggi da Velvet Island
description.spanish: Escapa de Velvet Island.

description.english: Save the nurse
description.french: Sauvez l’infirmière
description.italian: Salva l'infermiera
description.spanish: Salva a la enfermera.

displayName.english: I Can Do This All Day!

description.english: Kill more than 10 ghouls during the farmhouse assault
description.french: Tuez plus de 10 Ghouls pendant l’attaque de la ferme
description.german: Töte mehr als 10 Ghoule während des Angriffs auf das Bauernhaus
description.italian: Uccidi più di 10 ghoul durante l'assalto alla fattoria
description.spanish: Elimina a más de 10 ghouls en el ataque a la casa de la granja.

description.english: Enhance the knife
description.french: Améliorez le couteau
description.italian: Migliora il coltello
description.spanish: Mejora el cuchillo.

displayName.french: J’ai pas le temps de saigner

description.english: Hold out until the bleeding status stops from itself
description.french: Résistez jusqu’à ce que l’effet de saignement se dissipe
description.german: Halte durch, bis der Blutungsstatus von selbst aufhört
description.italian: Resisti finché il sanguinamento non si ferma da solo
description.spanish: Resiste hasta que se detenga el sangrado.

description.english: Finish the game on Very Easy difficulty
description.french: Terminez le jeu en mode très facile
description.german: Beende das Spiel auf Sehr Leicht
description.italian: Termina il gioco a difficoltà Molto facile
description.spanish: Termina el juego en la dificultad Muy Fácil.

description.english: Finish the game on Easy difficulty
description.french: Terminez le jeu en mode facile
description.italian: Termina il gioco a difficoltà Facile
description.spanish: Termina el juego en la dificultad Fácil.

description.english: Finish the game on Normal difficulty
description.french: Terminez le jeu en mode normal
description.italian: Termina il gioco a difficoltà Normale
description.spanish: Termina el juego en la dificultad Normal.

description.english: Finish the game on Hard difficulty
description.french: Terminez le jeu en mode difficile
description.italian: Termina il gioco a difficoltà Difficile
description.spanish: Termina el juego en la dificultad Difícil.

description.english: Finish the game on Very Hard difficulty
description.french: Terminez le jeu en mode très difficile
description.german: Beende das Spiel auf Sehr Schwer
description.italian: Termina il gioco a difficoltà Molto difficile
description.spanish: Termina el juego en la dificultad Muy Difícil.

description.english: Finish the game on In The Dead of Darkness difficulty
description.french: Terminez le jeu en difficulté au plus profond des ténèbres
description.german: Beende das Spiel auf dem In Tiefster Dunkelheit Schwierigkeitsgrad
description.italian: Termina il gioco a difficoltà Nel buio totale
description.spanish: Termina el juego en la dificultad En la Oscuridad Absoluta.

description.english: Die because of poison status while having an antidote in your inventory
description.french: Mourez suite aux dégats du poison en ayant un antidote dans votre inventaire
description.german: Stirb an einer Vergiftung, während du ein Gegengift im Inventar hast
description.italian: Muori per avvelenamento mentre hai un antidoto nel tuo inventario.
description.spanish: Muere envenenado aunque tengas un antídoto en el inventario.

description.english: Get the shotgun
description.french: Obtenez le fusil à pompe
description.italian: Ottieni il fucile
description.spanish: Obtén la escopeta.

description.english: Max out the shotgun
description.french: Améliorez le fusil à pompe au maximum
description.italian: Potenzia al massimo il fucile
description.spanish: Mejora la escopeta al máximo.

description.english: Max out ALL weapons
description.french: Améliorez toutes les armes au maximum
description.italian: Potenzia al massimo tutte le armi
description.spanish: Mejora al máximo todas las armas.

description.english: Max out the handgun
description.french: Améliorez le pistolet au maximum
description.italian: Potenzia al massimo la pistola
description.spanish: Mejora la pistola al máximo.

description.english: Finish the game without saving more than 5 times
description.french: Terminez le jeu en sauvegardant 5 fois maximum
description.german: Beende das Spiel ohne mehr als 5 Mal zu speichern
description.italian: Termina il gioco salvando al massimo 5 volte
description.spanish: Termina el juego sin guardar el avance más de 5 veces.

displayName.spanish: ¿Mapas? Adonde vamos no hacen falta mapas

description.english: Finish the game without opening the map once
description.french: Terminez le jeu sans jamais ouvrir la carte
description.german: Beende das Spiel, ohne die Karte zu öffnen
description.italian: Termina il gioco senza mai aprire la mappa
description.spanish: Termina el juego sin abrir el mapa ni una vez.

description.english: Finish the game in less than 7 hours
description.french: Terminez le jeu en moins de 7 heures
description.german: Beende das Spiel in weniger als 7 Stunden
description.italian: Termina il gioco in meno di 7 ore
description.spanish: Termina el juego en menos de siete horas.

description.english: Consume 50 painkillers in a single playthrough
description.french: Utilisez 50 analgésiques dans une partie
description.german: Konsumiere 50 Schmerzmittel in einem einzigen Durchgang
description.italian: Consuma 50 antidolorifici in una singola partita
description.spanish: Consume 50 calmantes en una misma partida.

description.english: Collect all clues in a single playthrough
description.french: Récupérez tous les indices dans une partie
description.german: Sammle alle Hinweise in einem einzigen Durchgang
description.italian: Raccogli tutti gli indizi in una singola partita
description.spanish: Recoge todas las pistas en una sola partida.

description.english: Collect all files in a single playthrough
description.french: Récupérez tous les documents dans une partie
description.german: Sammle alle Dokumente in einem einzigen Durchgang
description.italian: Raccogli tutti i file in una singola partita
description.spanish: Recoge todos los documentos en una sola partida.

description.english: Finish the game without ever being grabbed by ghoul or creeper
description.french: Terminez le jeu sans vous faire attraper par une Ghoul ou un Creeper
description.german: Beende das Spiel, ohne jemals von einem Ghoul oder Creeper gepackt zu werden
description.italian: Termina il gioco senza farti mai prendere da un ghoul o un creeper
description.spanish: Termina el juego sin que nunca te toque un ghoul o un creeper.

description.english: Fill up the entire storage box
description.french: Remplissez en entier le coffre de stockage
description.italian: Riempi completamente la cassa degli oggetti
description.spanish: Completa el espacio de almacenamiento.

displayName.french: Je vais reprendre la même chose

description.english: Finish the game in new game plus
description.french: Terminez le jeu en new game +
description.german: Beende das Spiel im New Game Plus-Modus
description.italian: Termina il gioco in modalità Nuova partita+
description.spanish: Termina el juego en nueva partida +.

description.english: Find your first clue
description.french: Trouvez votre premier indice
description.italian: Trova il tuo primo indizio
description.spanish: Encuentra la primera pista.

displayName.italian: Si vive una volta sola… forse

description.english: Die for the first time
description.french: Mourez pour la première fois
description.italian: Muori per la prima volta
description.spanish: Muere por primera vez.

description.english: Finish the game without using a first aid kit
description.french: Terminez le jeu sans utiliser de kit de soin
description.german: Beende das Spiel, ohne ein Erste-Hilfe-Set zu benutzen
description.italian: Termina il gioco senza mai usare un kit di primo soccorso
description.spanish: Termina el juego sin usar ningún kit de primeros auxilios.

displayName.german: Sieh' nur, es ist ein Monster!

description.french: Tuez une Ghoul
description.italian: Uccidi un ghoul
description.spanish: Elimina a un ghoul.

description.english: Kill a Scavenger
description.french: Tuez un Scavenger
description.italian: Uccidi uno scavenger
description.spanish: Elimina a un carroñero.

displayName.italian: Gli artigli sono veloci, i tuoi riflessi di più

description.english: Kill a Ripper
description.french: Tuez un Ripper
description.italian: Uccidi un ripper
description.spanish: Elimina a un destripador.

description.english: Kill a Terror
description.french: Tuez une Terror
description.italian: Uccidi un terror
description.spanish: Elimina a un terror.

description.english: Kill a Spider Glutton
description.french: Tuez une Spider Glutton
description.italian: Uccidi uno spider glutton
description.spanish: Elimina a una araña voraz.

description.english: Try to kill the same Creeper 7 times
description.french: Essayez de tuer le même Creeper 7 fois
description.german: Versuche denselben Creeper 7 Mal zu töten
description.italian: Prova a uccidere lo stesso creeper 7 volte
description.spanish: Intenta eliminar al mismo creeper siete veces.

description.english: Kill a Screamer
description.french: Tuez un Screamer
description.italian: Uccidi uno screamer
description.spanish: Elimina a un gritón.

description.english: Finish the game with an S Ranking
description.french: Terminez le jeu avec un rang S
description.german: Beende das Spiel mit einem S-Rang
description.italian: Termina il gioco con una valutazione S
description.spanish: Termina el juego con clasificación S.

description.english: Finish the game with an S+ Ranking
description.french: Terminez le jeu avec un rang S+
description.german: Beende das Spiel mit einem S+-Rang
description.italian: Termina il gioco con una valutazione S+
